SessionName.title: Server Name
SessionName.description: The name of your server. This is how it will display in the server browser.

QueryPort.title: Steam Query Port
QueryPort.description: The port used for steams query

rcon_pass.title: Admin password
rcon_pass.description: Admin password. Required to run admin commands in game or via RCon.

rcon_port.title: RCON Port
rcon_port.description: Port the server will listen for RCON on

ServerSettings#AllowCaveBuildingPvE.title: Allow Cave Building PvE
ServerSettings#AllowCaveBuildingPvE.description: Allows building in caves when PvE mode is also enabled.

ServerSettings#alwaysNotifyPlayerJoined.title: Notify on join
ServerSettings#alwaysNotifyPlayerJoined.description: Players will always get notified if someone joins the server

ServerSettings#alwaysNotifyPlayerLeft.title: Notify on leave
ServerSettings#alwaysNotifyPlayerLeft.description: Players will always get notified if someone leaves the server

ServerSettings#bAllowFlyerCarryPvE.title: Allow flying carry
ServerSettings#bAllowFlyerCarryPvE.description: Permit flying dinosaurs to pick up other dinosaurs and players when mounted by a player in PvE

ServerSettings#bDisableStructureDecayPvE.title: Structure decay disable
ServerSettings#bDisableStructureDecayPvE.description: Disable the gradual (7 days) decay of player structures

ServerSettings#DayCycleSpeedScale.title: Day Cycle Speed Scale
ServerSettings#DayCycleSpeedScale.description: Specifies the scaling factor for the passage of time

ServerSettings#DayTimeSpeedScale.title: Day Time Speed Scale
ServerSettings#DayTimeSpeedScale.description: Specifies the scaling factor for the passage of time in the ARK during the day

ServerSettings#NightTimeSpeedScale.title: Night Time Speed Scale
ServerSettings#NightTimeSpeedScale.description: Specifies the scaling factor for the passage of time in the ARK during night time

ServerSettings#DinoCharacterFoodDrainMul.title: Dino Character Food Drain Multiplier
ServerSettings#DinoCharacterFoodDrainMul.description: Specifies the scaling factor for dinosaurs' food consumption. Higher values increase food consumption

ServerSettings#DinoCharacterHealthRecove.title: Dino Character Health Recovery Multiplier
ServerSettings#DinoCharacterHealthRecove.description: Specifies the scaling factor for dinosaurs' health recovery. Higher values increase the recovery rate

ServerSettings#DinoCharacterStaminaDrain.title: Dino Character Stamina Drain Multiplier
ServerSettings#DinoCharacterStaminaDrain.description: Specifies the scaling factor for dinosaurs' stamina consumption. Higher values increase stamina consumption

ServerSettings#DinoCountMultiplier.title: Dino Count Multiplier
ServerSettings#DinoCountMultiplier.description: Specifies the scaling factor for dinosaur spawns. Higher values increase the number of dinosaurs spawned throughout the ARK.

ServerSettings#DinoDamageMultiplier.title: Dino Damage Multiplier
ServerSettings#DinoDamageMultiplier.description: Specifies the scaling factor for the damage dinosaurs deal with their attacks. The default value 1 provides normal damage. Higher values increase damage. Lower values decrease it.

ServerSettings#DinoResistanceMultiplier.title: Dino Resistance Multiplier
ServerSettings#DinoResistanceMultiplier.description: Specifies the scaling factor for the resistance to damage dinosaurs receive when attacked

ServerSettings#HarvestAmountMultiplier.title: Harvest Amount Multiplier
ServerSettings#HarvestAmountMultiplier.description: Specifies the scaling factor for yields from all harvesting activities (chopping down trees, picking berries, carving carcasses, mining rocks, etc.)

ServerSettings#HarvestHealthMultiplier.title: Harvest Health Multiplier
ServerSettings#HarvestHealthMultiplier.description: Specifies the scaling factor for the "health" of items that can be harvested (trees, rocks, carcasses, etc.)

ServerSettings#MaxStructuresInRange.title: Range between structures
ServerSettings#MaxStructuresInRange.description: (OUTDATED) Specifies the minimum required distance between player structures by different players or tribes

ServerSettings#noTributeDownloads.title: Disable tribute download
ServerSettings#noTributeDownloads.description: Disables downloading characters from other servers

ServerSettings#PlayerCharacterFoodDrainM.title: Player Character Food Drain Multiplier
ServerSettings#PlayerCharacterFoodDrainM.description: Specifies the scaling factor for player characters' food consumption

ServerSettings#PlayerCharacterHealthReco.title: Player Character Health Recovery Multiplier
ServerSettings#PlayerCharacterHealthReco.description: Specifies the scaling factor for player characters' health recovery. Higher values increase the recovery rate

ServerSettings#PlayerCharacterStaminaDra.title: Player Character Stamina Drain Multiplier
ServerSettings#PlayerCharacterStaminaDra.description: Specifies the scaling factor for player characters' stamina consumption. Higher values increase stamina consumption

ServerSettings#PlayerCharacterWaterDrain.title: Player Character Water Drain Multiplier
ServerSettings#PlayerCharacterWaterDrain.description: Specifies the scaling factor for player characters' water consumption. Higher values increase water consumption

ServerSettings#PlayerDamageMultiplier.title: Player Damage Multiplier
ServerSettings#PlayerDamageMultiplier.description: Specifies the scaling factor for the damage players deal with their attacks.

ServerSettings#PlayerResistanceMultiplie.title: Player Resistance Multiplier
ServerSettings#PlayerResistanceMultiplie.description: Specifies the scaling factor for the resistance to damage players receive when attacked

ServerSettings#proximityChat.title: Proximity chat
ServerSettings#proximityChat.description:: If enabled, only players near each other can chat to each other.

ServerSettings#ResourceNoReplenishRadius.title: Resource No Replenish Radius Players
ServerSettings#ResourceNoReplenishRadius.description: Defines the distance where there are no resources respawning when being close to a player

ServerSettings#ResourceNoReplenishRadius.title: Resource No Replenish Radius Structures
ServerSettings#ResourceNoReplenishRadius.description: Defines the distance where there are no resources respawning when being close to a structure

ServerSettings#ResourcesRespawnPeriodMul.title: Resources Respawn Period Multiplier
ServerSettings#ResourcesRespawnPeriodMul.description: Specifies the scaling factor for the respawn rate for resource nodes (trees, rocks, bushes, etc.)

ServerSettings#ServerAdminPassword.title: Server Admin Password
ServerSettings#ServerAdminPassword.description: If specified, players must provide this password (via the in-game console) to gain access to administrator commands on the server.

ServerSettings#ServerCrosshair.title: Enable the crosshair
ServerSettings#ServerCrosshair.description: Enable a crosshair for player on your server

ServerSettings#serverForceNoHud.title: Disable HUD
ServerSettings#serverForceNoHud.description: HUD force disabled for all players

ServerSettings#serverHardcore.title: Hardcore mode
ServerSettings#serverHardcore.description: Players will be reset to level 1 on death

ServerSettings#ServerPassword.title: Server password
ServerSettings#ServerPassword.description: Password required in order to join the server. Leave blank to disable.

ServerSettings#serverPVE.title: Server PVE mode
ServerSettings#serverPVE.description: If enabled, PVP is disabled and the server will be PVE (Player Versus Environment) only

ServerSettings#ShowMapPlayerLocation.title: Show Map Player Location
ServerSettings#ShowMapPlayerLocation.description: Show each player their own precise position when they view their map

ServerSettings#StructureDamageMultiplier.title: Structure Damage Multiplier
ServerSettings#StructureDamageMultiplier.description: Specifies the scaling factor for the damage structures deal with their attacks (i.e. spiked walls)

ServerSettings#StructureResistanceMultip.title: Structure Resistance Multiplier
ServerSettings#StructureResistanceMultip.description: SSpecifies the scaling factor for the resistance to damage structures receive when attacked

ServerSettings#TamedDinoDamageMultiplier.title: Tamed Dino Damage Multiplier
ServerSettings#TamedDinoDamageMultiplier.description: Specifies the scaling factor for tamed dinosaurs damage.

ServerSettings#TamedDinoResistanceMultip.title: Tamed Dino Resistance Multiplier
ServerSettings#TamedDinoResistanceMultip.description: Specifies the scaling factor for dinosaurs fortitude.

ServerSettings#TamingSpeedMultiplier.title: Taming Speed Multiplier
ServerSettings#TamingSpeedMultiplier.description: Specifies the scaling factor for dinosaur taming speed.

ServerSettings#XPMultiplier.title: XP Multiplier
ServerSettings#XPMultiplier.description: Specifies the scaling factor for the experience received by players, tribes and dinosaurs for various actions

ServerSettings#EnablePVPGamma.title: Enable PVP Gamma
ServerSettings#EnablePVPGamma.description: Allows or disallows usage of gamma on PVP servers

ServerSettings#EnablePVEGamma.title: Enable PVE Gamma
ServerSettings#EnablePVEGamma.description: Allows or disallows usage of gamma on PVE servers

ServerSettings#SpectatorPassword.title: Spectator Password
ServerSettings#SpectatorPassword.description: To use non-admin spectator, the server must specify a spectator password. Then any client can use these console commands: requestspectator and stopspectating. See patch 191.0 for more information and hotkeys

ServerSettings#DifficultyOffset.title: Difficulty offset
ServerSettings#DifficultyOffset.description: Specifies the difficulty level of the creatures and the quality (and frequency) of loot spawned by the server. At 0.0, creatures and loot scale down by approximately 50%. At 1.0, they scale up by approximately 300%.

ServerSettings#PvEStructureDecayPeriodMu.title: PvE Structure Decay Period Multiplier
ServerSettings#PvEStructureDecayPeriodMu.description: Specifies the scaling factor for the decay rate of player structures in PvE mode.

ServerSettings#PvEStructureDecayDestruct.title: PvE Structure Decay Destruction Period
ServerSettings#PvEStructureDecayDestruct.description: Specifies the time required for player structures to decay in PvE mode.

ServerSettings#Banlist.title: Banlist
ServerSettings#Banlist.description: Uses the global banlist of ARK to disallow players' access who have been identified as cheaters

ServerSettings#PvPStructureDecay.title: PvP Structure Decay
ServerSettings#PvPStructureDecay.description: Activates (true) oder deactivates (false) the structure decay on PVP servers

ServerSettings#DisableDinoDecayPvE.title: Disable Dino Decay PvE
ServerSettings#DisableDinoDecayPvE.description: Deactivates the unclaiming functions for dinosaurs on PVE servers

ServerSettings#PvEDinoDecayPeriodMultipl.title: PvE Dino Decay Period Multiplier
ServerSettings#PvEDinoDecayPeriodMultipl.description: Multiplier value for the unclaiming speed of dinosaurs

ServerSettings#AdminLogging.title: Admin Logging
ServerSettings#AdminLogging.description: Enables the output of cheat commands that admins used (will be shown in chat)

ServerSettings#MaxTamedDinos.title: Max Tamed Dinos
ServerSettings#MaxTamedDinos.description: Defines the maximum amount of tamed dinos on the island

ServerSettings#MaxNumbersofPlayersInTrib.title: Max Numbers of Players In Tribe
ServerSettings#MaxNumbersofPlayersInTrib.description: SOTF setting: Defines the maximum player limit per tribe

ServerSettings#BattleNumOfTribestoStartG.title: Battle Num Of Tribes to Start Game
ServerSettings#BattleNumOfTribestoStartG.description: SOTF setting: Defines how many tribes must have been created before the countdown for game start begins

ServerSettings#TimeToCollapseROD.title: Time To Collapse ROD
ServerSettings#TimeToCollapseROD.description: SOTF setting: Defines the time period for the force field to collapse

ServerSettings#BattleAutoStartGameInterv.title: Battle Auto Start Game Interval
ServerSettings#BattleAutoStartGameInterv.description: SOTF setting: Defines the length of the countdown before match begins

ServerSettings#BattleSuddenDeathInterval.title: Battle Sudden Death Interval
ServerSettings#BattleSuddenDeathInterval.description: SOTF setting: Defines the time before sudden death starts

ServerSettings#KickIdlePlayersPeriod.title: Kick Idle Players Period
ServerSettings#KickIdlePlayersPeriod.description: Time period until an idling player will be kicked from server

ServerSettings#PerPlatformMaxStructuresM.title: Per Platform Max Structures Multiplier
ServerSettings#PerPlatformMaxStructuresM.description: Defines the multiplicator for structures on saddle plattforms (Please use with caution - too high values may lead to a massive lack of performance)

ServerSettings#StructureDamageRepairCool.title: Structure Damage Repair Cooldown
ServerSettings#StructureDamageRepairCool.description: Defines the cooldown time when a previously damaged structure can be repaired again. (0 allows the structure to be always repaired)

ServerSettings#bForceAllStructureLocking.title: Force All Structure Locking
ServerSettings#bForceAllStructureLocking.description: Server Option to allow Locking All Item Containers

ServerSettings#AutoDestroyOldStructuresM.title: Auto Destroy Old Structures Multiplier
ServerSettings#AutoDestroyOldStructuresM.description: Server Option to allow Auto-Destroying Structures after sufficient "no nearby Tribe" time has passed (defined as a multiplier of the Allow Claim period)

ServerSettings#MaxPlatformSaddleStructur.title: Max Platform Saddle Structure Limit
ServerSettings#MaxPlatformSaddleStructur.description: Defines the maximum number of structures on top of the saddle platform

ServerSettings#bPassiveDefensesDamageRid.title: Passive Defenses Damage Riderless Dinos
ServerSettings#bPassiveDefensesDamageRid.description: Wild dinos or dinos without a rider can take damage from defense structures like spikewalls if this setting is activated

ServerSettings#AutoSavePeriodMinutes.title: Auto Save Period Minutes
ServerSettings#AutoSavePeriodMinutes.description: After which time period (in minutes) the server should auto-save the game? (Hint: A more frequent interval may lead some lags)

ServerSettings#RCONServerGameLogBuffer.title: RCON Server Game Log Buffer
ServerSettings#RCONServerGameLogBuffer.description: How many chat lines should be available in RCON?

ServerSettings#OverrideStructurePlatform.title: Override Structure Platform Prevention
ServerSettings#OverrideStructurePlatform.description: Determines if turrets are allowed on moving platforms or not. Yes will prevent it. No will allow it

ServerSettings#PreventOfflinePvPInterval.title: Prevent Offline PvP Interval
ServerSettings#PreventOfflinePvPInterval.description: Defines the time period of being offline so that a player will be really considered as being offline.

ServerSettings#bPvPDinoDecay.title: PvP Dino Decay
ServerSettings#bPvPDinoDecay.description: Determines if dinos of a player/tribe are also protected in the activated offline raid protection

ServerSettings#bPvPStructureDecay.title: PvP Structure Decay
ServerSettings#bPvPStructureDecay.description: Determines if structures of a player/tribe are also protected in the activated offline raid protection

ServerSettings#DisableImprintDinoBuff.title: Disable Imprint Dino Buff
ServerSettings#DisableImprintDinoBuff.description: Deactivates (no) the bonus stats for a dino if you raise the baby by yourself

ServerSettings#AllowAnyoneBabyImprintCud.title: Allow Anyone Baby Imprint Cuddle
ServerSettings#AllowAnyoneBabyImprintCud.description: Allows everybody to kuddle with the dino baby

ServerSettings#EnableExtraStructurePreve.title: Enable Extra Structure Prevention Volumes
ServerSettings#EnableExtraStructurePreve.description: Prevents the building of structures on places which are rich of resources

ServerSettings#ShowFloatingDamageText.title: Show Floating Damage Text
ServerSettings#ShowFloatingDamageText.description: Shows dealt damages in a RPG style

ServerSettings#DestroyUnconnectedWaterPi.title: Destroy Unconnected Water Pipes
ServerSettings#DestroyUnconnectedWaterPi.description: If active, it will destroy the pipes automatically after two real-time days, if unconnected to any non-pipe (directly or indirectly) and no allied player is nearby

ServerSettings#TheMaxStructuresInRange.title: The Max Structures In Range
ServerSettings#TheMaxStructuresInRange.description: New value for the maximum allowed structures nearby

ServerSettings#MinimumDinoReuploadInterv.title: Minimum Dino Reupload Interval
ServerSettings#MinimumDinoReuploadInterv.description: Number of seconds cooldown between allowed Dino re-uploads (defaults to 0, set to 43200 on Official Servers which is 12 hours). Remaining cooldown time is displayed on the Dino Upload UI

ServerSettings#PvEAllowStructuresAtSuppl.title: PvE Allow Structures At Supply Drops
ServerSettings#PvEAllowStructuresAtSuppl.description: Enable if you want to allow being able to build structures nearby supply drop

ServerSettings#NPCNetworkStasisRangeScal.title: NPC Network Stasis Range Scale Player Count Start
ServerSettings#NPCNetworkStasisRangeScal.description: Range scaling-for-player-count option to scale server performance for more players

ServerSettings#NPCNetworkStasisRangeScal.title: NPC Network Stasis Range Scale Player Count End
ServerSettings#NPCNetworkStasisRangeScal.description: Range scaling-for-player-count option to scale server performance for more players

ServerSettings#NPCNetworkStasisRangeScal.title: NPC Network Stasis Range Scale Percent End
ServerSettings#NPCNetworkStasisRangeScal.description: Range scaling-for-player-count option to scale server performance for more players

ServerSettings#MaxPersonalTamedDinos.title: Max Personal Tamed Dinos
ServerSettings#MaxPersonalTamedDinos.description: Quantity of dinos that a tribe is allowed to have (Default on official PVE servers is 500)

ServerSettings#AutoDestroyDecayedDinos.title: Auto Destroy Decayed Dinos
ServerSettings#AutoDestroyDecayedDinos.description: Option to auto-destroy claimable decayed dinos on load, rather than have them remain around as claimable. Official PvE servers now have this enabled

ServerSettings#ClampItemSpoilingTimes.title: Clamp Item Spoiling Times
ServerSettings#ClampItemSpoilingTimes.description: Will clamp all spoiling times to the items' maximum spoiling times. Useful if any infinite-spoiling exploits were used on the server and you wish to clean them up. Could potentially cause issues with Mods that alter spoiling time, hence it is an option.

ServerSettings#UseOptimizedHarvestingHea.title: Use Optimized Harvesting Health
ServerSettings#UseOptimizedHarvestingHea.description: Server custom "HarvestAmountMultiplier" now works as it used to, to bias towards yielding rarer items. This is more costly for server performance, so if you want a more "optimized" server with high HarvestAmountMultiplier (but less rare items), you can launch with "yes" in this setting here

ServerSettings#AllowCrateSpawnsOnTopOfSt.title: Allow Crate Spawns On Top Of Structures
ServerSettings#AllowCrateSpawnsOnTopOfSt.description: Servers can now allow from-the-air Supply Crates to appear on top of Structures, rather than being prevented by Structures. Enabled on Official Servers

ServerSettings#ForceFlyerExplosives.title: Force Flyer Explosives
ServerSettings#ForceFlyerExplosives.description: Made all Flyers except for Quetz and Wyvern become 'grounded' if you put a C4 on them. To disable this behavior, launch server with "yes"

ServerSettings#PreventOfflinePvP.title: Prevent Offline PvP
ServerSettings#PreventOfflinePvP.description: Enables ORP on PVE/PVP servers if enabled

ServerSettings#AllowFlyingStaminaRecover.title: Allow Flying Stamina Recovery
ServerSettings#AllowFlyingStaminaRecover.description: Flyer Nerf (to allow server to recover Stamina when standing on a Flyer

ServerSettings#AllowMultipleAttachedC4.title: Allow Multiple Attached C4
ServerSettings#AllowMultipleAttachedC4.description: Limited one C4 attached per dino, unless you allow more than one C4

ServerSettings#OxygenSwimSpeedStatMultip.title: Oxygen Swim Speed Stat Multiplier
ServerSettings#OxygenSwimSpeedStatMultip.description: Use this to set how swim speed is multiplied by level spent in oxygen.

ServerSettings#bPvEDisableFriendlyFire.title: PvE Disable Friendly Fire
ServerSettings#bPvEDisableFriendlyFire.description: When enabled, you are now able to harvest a slaughtered Ovis

ServerSettings#ServerAutoForceRespawnWil.title: Server Auto Force Respawn Wild Dinos Interval
ServerSettings#ServerAutoForceRespawnWil.description: This will force respawns of dinos on servers to prevent certain dino types (like the Basilo and Spino) from becoming depopulated on long running servers. Specify a value in seconds (86400 means a forced respawn after one day (realtime) for example)

ServerSettings#RandomSupplyCratePoints.title: Random Supply Crate Points
ServerSettings#RandomSupplyCratePoints.description: Server Option to make Supply Crates random

ServerSettings#CrossARKAllowForeignDinoD.title: Cross ARK Allow Foreign Dino Downloads
ServerSettings#CrossARKAllowForeignDinoD.description: This allows you to download Non-Aberration Dinos on Aberration

ServerSettings#PersonalTamedDinosSaddleS.title: Personal Tamed Dinos Saddle Structure Cost
ServerSettings#PersonalTamedDinosSaddleS.description: Defines how many tame slots are being used by a saddle platform (with structures) - Default: 19

MessageOfTheDay#Duration.title: MOTD Duration
MessageOfTheDay#Duration.description: Specifies the duration of the welcome message
